snippet.title: DEV DIVE | Ichiban's Holiday DLC - COMING APRIL 10!
snippet.description:
Hello Divers!

It's the first Dev Dive episode of the year!

In this video, we’ll share the behind-the-scenes story of how the 'Ichiban’s Holiday' DLC came to be, plus give you a closer look at the new content.

And stay tuned until the end to check out some new Dave the Diver merchandise, coming soon to the US & Canada and Korea!

※ The 'Ichiban's Holiday' DLC will launch on April 10.
※ The 'Animate merchandice' will be available from:
     - US & Canada: April 19
     - Korea: March 29

©Mintrocket. All Rights Reserved. ©SEGA

-------------

🤿 Meet Dave on:
  • Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868140/
  • Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/dave-the-diver-switch/
  • PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009413/

🐬 Find out more about DAVE THE DIVER! 
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/DaveDiverGame
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/davethediver
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@mintrocket_official
  • Website: https://mintrock.et/
